title: Fragment, late 14th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic (beaten gold on vellum wrapped around linen core)
Technique: two integrated plain weave structures (lampas), with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocading)
description: Addorsed dolphins in metal threads on a green ground with small scale floral and palmette forms. Horizontals bands of metal threads at the bottom indicate that this fragment came from the bottom of the fabric.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, late 14th century.
late 14th century. Medium: silk, metallic (beaten gold on vellum wrapped around linen core)
Technique: two integrated plain weave structures (lampas), with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocading). Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-278.
